Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing immediately after SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of process variants that include SW-Awaiting EIC Decision followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are preceded by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurred at least once
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-Awaiting EIC Decision that ultimately lead to an acceptance (e.g., SW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision events that occur without any prior SW-Reviewer Agreed activity in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences relative to the total number of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation executions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appearing in the longest-running variants (top 10% by duration)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is followed by a revision decision (SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Minor Revision, or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision instances that occur in variants also containing multiple reviewer invitation reminders (Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that started with Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist versus those that did not
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist' occurs

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision events that are part of variants including at least one instance of Assign a Different Editor
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting EIC Decision appears more than once in the same case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision occurrences that are eventually followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded (indicating progression toward publication)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' for cases where activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision events occurring after three or more distinct reviewer-related activities (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting EIC Decision is directly followed by SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'filter': "preceding_activity == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'"}"

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision events per month to identify temporal patterns in editorial decision latency
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
